songs.title: Peace of Mind Only
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
Peace of mind, peace of night and day (Uh)
Where the fuck am I? Who am I? Where are we?
Peace of mind home, peace of mind, this is me

[Verse 1]
Right, mind dilalation, I'm shakin'
Not today Satan, please
Need some figuration, ventilation, please
Yeah, peace of mind, peace of night and day (Peace of mind)
Peace of mind, and I know

[Chorus 2]
Peace of mind, peace of night and day (Uh)
Made it out alive, made it out in one piece
Peace of mind only, peace of mind, peace of mind

[Verse 2]
Solarization, inversion, reality, yeah
I'm forever spacin', my escape story
My attainment sees...
Peace of mind, peace of mind, and I know

[Outro]
Peace of mind
Peace of mind
Peace of mind
